Package org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop

Contains Hadoop APIs.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Hadoop
    Hadoop facade providing access to Ignite Hadoop features.
    HadoopClasspathUtils.DirectoryFilter
    Directory filter interface.
    HadoopHelper
    IGFS utility processor adapter.
    HadoopJobInfo
    Extended job description.
    HadoopMapperAwareTaskOutput
    Special output type with callback invoked when mapper finished writing data.
    HadoopPartitioner
    Partitioner.
    HadoopSerialization
    Hadoop serialization.
    HadoopTaskInput
    Task input.
    HadoopTaskOutput
    Task output.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HadoopClassLoader
    Class loader allowing explicitly load classes without delegation to parent class loader.
    HadoopClasspathUtils
    Hadoop classpath utilities.
    HadoopClasspathUtils.AcceptAllDirectoryFilter
    Filter to accept all files.
    HadoopClasspathUtils.ExactDirectoryFilter
    Filter which uses exact comparison.
    HadoopClasspathUtils.PrefixDirectoryFilter
    Filter which uses prefix to filter files.
    HadoopClasspathUtils.SearchDirectory
    Simple pair-like structure to hold directory name and a mask assigned to it.
    HadoopDefaultJobInfo
    Hadoop job info based on default Hadoop configuration.
    HadoopFileBlock
    Hadoop file block.
    HadoopJobEx
    Hadoop job.
    HadoopJobId
    Job ID.
    HadoopJobStatus
    Hadoop job status.
    HadoopLocations
    Simple structure to hold Hadoop directory locations.
    HadoopNoopHelper
    Noop Hadoop Helper implementation.
    HadoopNoopProcessor
    Hadoop processor.
    HadoopProcessorAdapter
    Hadoop processor.
    HadoopTask
    Hadoop task.
    HadoopTaskContext
    Task context.
    HadoopTaskInfo
    Task info.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HadoopJobPhase
    Job run phase.
    HadoopJobProperty
    Enumeration of optional properties supported by Apache Ignite Hadoop Accelerator.
    HadoopTaskType
    Task type.

Package org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop Description

Contains Hadoop APIs.
